column4: my 'direct rendering' is somehow disabled. How can I enable it? I have a Radeon 9600
are you using the restricted driver?
how can I check for that?
the checkbox at my Graphics is 'Checked' under 'Restricted Drivers Manager'
I got that file open in a text editor now. What do you mean by 'pastebin'..?
I got it uploaded now I think @  http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/41861/
I dont know what Xgl is... I assume it's a bad thing now? :)
it's how you run compiz on the restricted ATI drivers (unless you use the very latest release)
so to get direct rendering, I ahve to disable compiz?
ok, thanks for your time. I really appreciate it. I may return later?
I still cant get compiz up. It says 'Fatal: GLX_EXT_texture_from_pixmap is missing'
